member.name: T:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for instantiating proxy objects and handling their method dispatch.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy.Create(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an object instance that derives from class and implements interface .

exception.para: is sealed or abstract, or doesn't inherit from the type or has a parameterless constructor.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy.Create``2
member.summary: Creates an object instance that derives from class and implements interface .
member.typeparam: The interface the proxy should implement.
The base class to use for the proxy class.
member.exception: is a class, or is sealed or does not have a parameterless constructor.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.DispatchProxy.Invoke(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Whenever any method on the generated proxy type is called, this method is invoked to dispatch control.
member.param: The arguments the caller passed to the method.
member.returns: The object to return to the caller, or for void methods.
